title: I tried the gamebar fix but still crash at random moments ingame

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I tried mr Digital Ram's Fix but it amounted to nothing for me I also asked Riot Support did a fresh reinstall did everything possible and it still happens to me I'm getting quite annoyed by it Please help
"Hey ya'll, Digital Ram from PS Tech here.

We've noticed a bump in issues relating to FPS drops and crashing on the loading screen, after Champ Select. This issue seems to be caused by a Windows 10 app called the Game Bar. This feature has been causing a plethora of issues in game and in Champ Select. If you are experiencing these issues after updating Windows 10, please follow the steps below:

NOTE: You will need to be logged into your Microsoft email account for this.

Turn off the Game Bar in the Xbox app. You can do this by following these steps:

    Open the Xbox app by going to the Search bar on the bottom left of the screen and typing "Xbox‚Äù
    Click on the Settings (Gear) icon on the left.
    Click on Game DVR at the top.
    Click on the On/Off (switch) under "Record game clips and screenshots using Game DVR" to turn it off. (it should be gray and set to "Off")

If you are having trouble locating the Game DVR, this Ten Forums post has a visual Step-by-Step guide that will walk you through this.

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us by Submitting a ticket. Make sure to include logs gathered by our handy Hextech Repair Tool.

Thanks!"

replies.body:
There are a few thing that could be causing this. Typically crashes mid-game are caused by poor driver interactions or hardware issues. Check out our [Bugsplat & Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) for a list of common solutions for this.

Let me know if those steps resolved this.
it only happens once at around 8-12minutes

It sounds like we'll need to take a look at your system logs to further investigate. I recommend running a set with our [Hextech Toolkit](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Our tech team will be happy to assist you further with this.

Let me know if you have any issues submitting that ticket.
